DOC.brief_summary: The study understand whether distribution two different supply nicotine patch telephone quitline effect quit rate . The two different supply four vs. eight ( two separate four-week mailing ) week nicotine patch . The hypothesis eight week slightly efficacious four week cost-effective .
DOC.brief_title: A Cost-effectiveness Study Nicotine Patches Distributed Through Quitline
DOC.criteria: All caller Colorado QuitLine report currently smoke 1620 cigarette enroll QuitLine service require physician approval obtain nicotine replacement therapy willing receive nicotine patch Contraindications receive nicotine patch QuitLine without physician approval include : history hearth disease ( heart attack , chest pain , coronary artery disease ) , high blood pressure , pregnancy , skin condition difficult manage psoriasis eczema , history local reaction nicotine patch complete call English
